translations: 发出雷射光（lase 的 ing 形式）

sentences.sentence: Inversion without lasing can also occur when the conditions are changed.
sentences.translation: 在另一条件下，系统则能够呈现无激光反转。

sentences.sentence: But now physicists in the US have shown how to induce lasing in a single living biological cell.
sentences.translation: 但是现在美国的科学家已经知道怎么用一个活着的生物细胞激发出激光。

sentences.sentence: His other trick is to boost the output power of the lasing material, neodymium-doped yttrium aluminium garnet.
sentences.translation: 他所采用的另一个诀窍就是提高激光物质，掺钕的钇铝石榴石的输出功率。
